inner.description: We are looking for a strong Sales/Presales Manager to join our team in Belarus (Minsk).

details.title: Responsibilities
list: Work on incoming business opportunities and software development requests from potential clients, including identification and development of their needs
Arrange and take part in meetings with clients to define business needs and goals, as well as collect project requirements
Conduct initial requirements analysis, aligning Qaprosoft capabilities with clients’ business needs
Assemble a team efficient for a specific request processing; closely work with the team to develop potential solutions for clients’ business challenges
Present solutions to clients, positioning Qaprosoft experience and services as a competitive advantage and a key differentiator
Prepare business proposals; create documents for clients, featuring Qaprosoft experience, services, and values
Deal with business uncertainty in order to develop the dialogue with a client till the deal closure and further transfer of the project to the development team

details.title: Requirements
list: 2+ years of overall IT experience
Understanding of software development lifecycle
Strong written and spoken English (Advanced)
Experience in creating well-structured and easy-to-read documents and presentations
Proficient skills in conducting presentations to different types of audiences (C-Level, engineering team, etc.)
Ability to make decisions under uncertainty

details.title: Experience in one or several of these areas will be a major plus
list: Business negotiating
Business analysis of commercial projects
Creating project delivery and team onboarding plans
Risk management: detecting potential business/technical risks in project delivery and implementation
Technical background

details.title: Benefits
list: Competitive salary
Comfortable work environment
Comfortably equipped office in the City center near “Lenin Square” subway station, and a large parking lot
Modern office equipped with lounge room
Fruits, cookies, and drinks at the office
Free English classes at the office
Paid professional conferences and meetups
Computer Mac — for every employee!
Other perks and bonuses
Flexible start of the working day from 9 AM to 11 AM

inner.description: Now we are starting a new and long-term Healthcare project. We are looking for a Middle PHP Developer to join our team in Belarus (Minsk) and to complete all the emerging/new tasks.

details.title: Requirements
list: 2+ years of practical experience
Excellent knowledge of PHP, JS, WordPress, RESTFul APIs
Knowledge of  Laravel, WooCommerce опыт, Angular would be a HUGE plus
English - A2 and upper

details.title: Benefits
list: Interesting and stable project with practical benefits
A wide field to express your initiative and a friendly atmosphere in the team
Career opportunities
Free English classes at the office
Paid conference attendances and the purchase of a professional literature
We play volleyball together every Friday
We have our own Elevator Pitch where you can present your project or receive investment for its development and get valuable prizes
Comfortably equipped office in the City center near “Lenin Square” subway station, and a large parking lot
We often have pizza and board games parties and we love to watch sports championships together
Modern office equipped with lounge room
Fruits, cookies, and drinks at the office
Flexible start of the working day from 9 AM to 11 AM
You can contribute to developing our own open-source products and see the practical results of your work as more and more people use them

inner.description: Currently, our development team is working on a popular musical app for karaoke (with over 50 million users worldwide) and our project is growing rapidly. We are looking for an Android Developer to join our team in Belarus (Minsk) and to work for this project.

details.title: Requirements
list: Excellent knowledge of Java, Android, multithreading, and UI
Believe in TDD philosophy
Be passionate about your work
4+ years of experience
English - B1 and upper

details.title: Benefits
list: An enthusiastic senior-level team and a stable project
Paid conference attendances and the purchase of a professional literature
We often have pizza and board games parties and we love to watch sports championships together
Every Friday the whole team plays volleyball
Free English classes at the office
Modern office equipped with lounge room
Fruits, cookies, and drinks at the office
Our own Elevator Pitch - an internal contest of our employees’ projects with a chance to win valuable prizes
You can contribute to developing our own open-source products and see the practical results of your work as more and more people use them

inner.description: With regards to a new office opening, Qaprosoft (Ukraine) is looking for a strong Senior QA Engineer to join the team in Chernivtsi, Ukraine.

details.title: Responsibilities
list: Design functional, integration and regression test plans
Build and execute manual and automated tests and perform highly complex analysis for multiple products
Set cross-functional product testing standards
Analyze, evaluate and plan methods of approach and organize means to achieve solutions to complex problems
Create reports
Work both independently and in the close collaboration with other team members and across the business (different apps with shared user base)

details.title: Requirements
list: 2-3 years experience in software testing (WEB and Mobile)
Knowledge of development cycle for mobile/web applications
Knowledge of specifics of iOS and Android
Advanced level of Jira/Confluence knowledge
Experience in using TestRail or another test cases management systems
Basics of xCode/Android studio
Monitoring tools: xCode logs, adb logs, browsers dev tools
Knowledge of HTML proxy tools would be an advantage
Work schedule: 5 pm - 1 am Kiev time/ 7 pm - 3 am Kiev time on Winter; 4 pm - 11 pm Kiev time on Summer

details.title: Benefits
list: Competitive salary
Comfortable work environment
Brand new modern office located in a peaceful green zone
Family mode office atmosphere
Remote work opportunity
Fruits, cookies, and drinks at the office
Free English classes at the office
Free accounting services
Long-term projects and stable projects
4-weeks paid vacation
Paid professional conferences and meetups
Corporate discounts and events
Computer Mac — for every employee!
Other perks and bonuses

inner.description:
Now we are inviting a Middle Manual QA Engineer to join our team in Belarus (Minsk) and work for a large fitness project. This app emerged in 2005 and has been on the increase/growing ever since. The app tracks the health status, physical indicators, and sports progress. The app lets you set personal goals and achieve excellent results (the app has over 200 million users who tested its effectiveness).
This project’s schedule would be perfect for the night owls.

details.title: Requirements
list: you have an agile mind, love to learn everything new and improve your own professional skills
2+ years of software testing (WEB and Mobile)

Experience in working with foreign customers (English - Intermediate and upper). There’s a good communication process established between the client and developers on this project, the team itself consists of more than 20 people

details.title: Benefits
list: You are provided with all the devices necessary for work (Apple)
Remote work from home
A large team of experienced colleagues
No early alarm bell and traffic jam
Constant practice in speaking English with the customer and internal English courses for the employees
Paid conference attendances and the purchase of professional literature
Our own Elevator Pitch for the employees

inner.description: With regards to a new office opening, Qaprosoft (Ukraine) is looking for a talented and ambitious Manual QA Lead/ Team Lead to join the team in Chernivtsi, Ukraine.

details.title: Requirements
list: Extensive product quality assurance and testing experience within different domains - 3+ years of experience
Great soft and communication skills
Proactivity in managing priorities for the team and the project
Mentorship experience and ability to review and audit efforts by fellow members
Solid understanding of Methodologies and QA practices

details.title: Preferred Skills
list: Team management skills is a big plus
Ability to lead the team to make it even stronger
Good judgment and ability to prioritize the business and project needs
Experience in using TestRail or another test case management system
Experience with running automated tests on a CI pipeline (Jenkins preferable)
Experience with mobile testing and automation
Knowledge of development cycle for mobile/web applications
Knowledge of specifics of iOS and Android
Advanced level of Jira/Confluence knowledge
Knowledge of HTML proxy tools would be an advantage

details.title: Responsibilities
list: Build QA processes on the project from scratch
Managing a test team (up to 6 members) and planning workload
Resource management
Design test strategies
Create test reports for software releases
Participate in the Agile planning and design process for new features and initiatives
Design, plan and execute tests which validate software specs

details.title: Benefits
list: Competitive salary
Comfortable work environment
Brand new modern office located in a peaceful green zone
Family mode office atmosphere
Fruits, cookies, and drinks at the office
Free English classes at the office
Free accounting services
Long-term projects and stable projects
4-weeks paid vacation
Paid professional conferences and meetups
Corporate discounts and events
Computer Mac — for every employee!
Other perks and bonuses

inner.description: Our project is a native application written in Objective-C using C++ and a tendency of gradually transitioning to Switch, which allows users from different continents to sing karaoke together. Now we are looking for a Senior iOS Developer to join our team in Belarus (Minsk).

details.title: Requirements
list: 4+ years of experience in developing of the native mobile iOS apps
Excellent knowledge of Objective-C and Cocoa Touch
Design patterns, IoC, DI, SOLID, KISS’
Expert-level understanding of RESTful APIs and client-server communication
Believe in TDD philosophy
English - B1
